Name: Gilbey Vintner's Punch
Ingredients: 30 ml Lustau Oloroso Don Nuño Sherry
Instructions: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. Carefully FLOAT stout.
History: Created in 2015 by Chris Strong, The Luggage Room, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Gilbey Vintner's Punch contains 223 calories
